class_notes: (THIS COURSE IS FULL; contact candleregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on waiting list) (HYBRID: Meets ON CAMPUS Tuesday-Saturday 8:30am-12:30pm; students will complete the remaining 3 hours of required contact time each day via instructor-led asynchronous work each afternoon)
course_description: This course examines contextualization of the preached word, prophetic and pastoral preaching, and critical engagement of contemporary social issues and "isms" in the preaching moment. (P620CEE when offered as a Contextual Education Elective).
